message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this incredible opportunity to purchase a unique and valuable product. I'm confident you'll love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $2000000.
Alice, your product sounds interesting, but $2000000 is a bit steep for me. I'm willing to offer $1200000 for it. Let's see if we can find common ground.

I understand you're looking for a better deal, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I still need to make a profit. I'm counteroffering at $1800000. This is my final counteroffer, so let's see if we can seal the deal.

Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. While $1800000 is closer, it's still above my budget. I'm prepared to go up to $1500000. This is my final offer, so let me know if you're open to it.

I've made a significant concession, Bob, but I still need to make a profit. I'm willing to meet you at $1600000, but I'm not going any lower. This is my final counteroffer, so let's see if we can reach an agreement.
